name: Bloobs
description:
Escort the Bloobers to safety* at all costs! Can these wee squishy balls of blue, Dodge Duck Dip Dive and... Dodge their way to the finish line? Perhaps they can with the help of the omnipresent YOU!

*Safety not guaranteed 

My record is 26 Bloobs.

Solo project made by me with the exception of music from http://www.twinmusicom.org/
Cute Faces Sprites from Todemann : https://todemann.itch.io/cute-faces-sprite
Textures from the Unreal Learning module "Creating a Level Blockout for Game Development" https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/creating-a-level-blockout

Made as a submission for GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022.
